name: Quicksand of our existence
description:
You are in Eden, the snake and Eve ask you for help 

to collect the finest apples of all Eden .....

--How To Play--

click of a mouse  to change sides 

collect apples & avoid obstacles (skulls, trees, fingers & of course ducks)

Art and code by Me (Bluchu)

Music:

main menu theme by Me (Bluchu)

level music:  Dead Pixels by Seasons

https://seasonsofficial.bandcamp.com/album/dead-pixels-ep

plugin for sprites react to music: Apollo Visualizer Kit by Greendog Games

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/audio/apollo-visualizer-kit-59035

Thank you for playing! 

Bluchu
